Title: If Beale Street Could Talk
Writer: Barry Jenkins (written for the screen by), James Baldwin (based on the book by)
Actors: KiKi Layne, Stephan James, Regina King, Teyonah Parris
Plot: A young woman embraces her pregnancy while she and her family set out to prove her childhood friend and lover innocent of a crime he didn't commit.
Production: Pastel, Annapurna Pictures, Plan B Entertainment
